citeinfo.title: ETHANOL_PRODUCTION_FACILITIES_IN: Ethanol Production Facilities in Indiana (Indiana Geological Survey, Point Shapefile)

descript.abstract: This GIS layer shows the locations of ethanol production facilities in the state of Indiana. Attributes include the name and address of the facility, and information regarding ethanol production capacity.
descript.purpose: This GIS layer was developed to show the locations of ethanol production facilities in Indiana.
descript.supplinf:
Information regarding ethanol production facilities was obtained from the following sources --
(1) Fact Sheet - Biofuel Plants in Indiana at http://www.in.gov/isda/biofuels/factsheet.pdf
(2) Indiana Ethanol Plants -- Purdue University at http://cobweb.ecn.purdue.edu/~lorre/16/Biofuel%20Factsheets/pdms

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 10, 207 KB.

attracc.attraccr: Locations were obtained from two sources (1) Fact Sheet - Biofuel Plants in Indiana at http://www.in.gov/isda/biofuels/factsheet.pdf (2) Indiana Ethanol Plants -- Purdue University at http://cobweb.ecn.purdue.edu/~lorre/16/Biofuel%20Factsheets/pdms Addresses were entered into the Web site named "Mapquest" at http://www.mapquest.com/. Using ESRI ArcMap, a new shapefile named "ETHANOL_PRODUCTION_041811.SHP" was created, and points were added by visual comparison with sites located using Mapquest. Attributes were populated with values obtained from Items 1 and 2, above.

dataqual.complete: All ethanol-production sites listed in the sources cited above are represented in this dataset.

horizpa.horizpar: Mapquest (http://www.mapquest.com/) was used to locate the ethanol production facilities. Using ESRI ArcMap, points were added by visual comparison with Mapquest.

citeinfo.title: Fact Sheet -- Biofuel Plants in Indiana

srcinfo.srccitea: Fact Sheet, Indiana State Department of Agriculture
srcinfo.srccontr: Names of ethanol production facilities in Indiana.
Names of ethanol-production facilities, together with production capacities.

procstep.procdesc: Locations were obtained from two sources (1) Fact Sheet - Biofuel Plants in Indiana at http://www.in.gov/isda/biofuels/factsheet.pdf (2) Indiana Ethanol Plants -- Purdue University at http://cobweb.ecn.purdue.edu/~lorre/16/Biofuel%20Factsheets/pdms Addresses were entered into the Web site named "Mapquest" at http://www.mapquest.com/. Using ESRI ArcMap, a new shapefile named "ETHANOL_PRODUCTION_041811.SHP" was created, and points were added by visual comparison with sites located using Mapquest. Attributes were populated with values obtained from Items (1) and (2), above. The shapefile was renamed as "ETHANOL_PRODUCTION_FACILITIES_IN.SHP."
procstep.srcprod: Fact Sheet, Indiana State Department of Agriculture, and Indiana Ethanol Plants, Purdue University

procstep.procdesc: This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected.

attr.attrdef: Name of the ethanol production facility
Street address of the ethanol production facility
City in which facility is located
USPS zip code for facility address
Capacity, in units of "millions of gallons per year." No data is indicated by "-999."
Capacity, in units of "millions of bushels." No data is indicated by "-999."
Distiller's dried grains, in units of "1,000 Tons/yr." No data is indicated by "-999."
Year in which the facility was built. No data is indicated by "-999."

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It is not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone other than the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
